#labels Featured
<font color="#000000" size="6">*Donate*</font>

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

This project is created by Nicolas Mollet and is by no mean affiliated with Google. Free time is used to create and share icons for the Google Maps community.

If you feel this program is useful and want to support it please consider donating some money to support it's future development.

==How to donate==
The easiest way to donate to me is by [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=nico.mollet%40gmail%2ecom sending money with PayPal to nico.mollet(_at_)gmail.com].  You can donate with PayPal by using your credit card but note that PayPal will take a small processing fee if you don't already have a free PayPal account. If you prefer you can transfer money to me by bank, [mailto:nico.mollet_at_gmail.com email me] to get banking details.  If you want to remain anonymous and not have your name appear in the list below, please let me know.
